DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the usefulness of the Grief Recovery Method in assisting persons with spinal cord injuries to achieve as complete a recovery as possible, thereby allowing for fuller participation in life.
DOC.brief_title: Resolving Grief After Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.criteria: * Persons with recent spinal cord injury who are willing to participate in the program. * Unable or unwilling to participate.
